segments.text: I wonder if we can change the temperature .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I tried before . There are no buttons on the air conditioning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There must be buttons . How do they turn it on and off ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think it is centrally controlled . They control it at the main desk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , they have it too cold in here . I want to be warmer . I won't be able to sleep .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going downstairs for more drinking water . I will ask them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What did they say about the air conditioning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They said it is centrally controlled.All the rooms are the same . They can't change it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's stupid . How can I sleep in this ?
segments.speaker: S1
